purchase_history.title: Hidden Figures - Blu-ray
purchase_history.description: Watch the inspiring story of a group of African-American women mathematicians working at NASA, pivotal to the success of the first space missions.

purchase_history.title: Hidden Figures: The American Dream and the Untold Story of the Black Women Mathematicians Who Helped Win the Space Race
purchase_history.description: Dive deeper into the fascinating story that inspired the movie with this detailed account of the African-American mathematicians who worked behind the scenes at NASA.

purchase_history.title: Women of NASA LEGO Set
purchase_history.description: Build and explore the women of NASA with this LEGO set, celebrating their roles in space exploration and science.
